primary_trope.hook_text: Where Big Sugar Gravel breaks you

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Big Sugar Gravel breaks you. 100 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.text_on_screen: Big Sugar Gravel — Where It Hurts
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 21
beats.narration: Mile 21. Suicide Hill. The legendary Suicide Hill. Brutal reputation earned through years of carnage. 90° corners with descents. straight down into a turn at the bottom. Sharp gravel increases crash and puncture risk.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Ozark Mountain gravel with punchy repeated climbs

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 55
beats.narration: Mile 55. Missouri Border Grind. You've crossed into Missouri. The punchy 13%+ grade climbs keep coming. No sustained efforts. just repeated accelerations that shred diesel riders.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Ozark Mountain gravel with punchy repeated climbs

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 80
beats.narration: Mile 80. Exposed Gravel Stretch. Two miles of exposed threshold effort at 9-10 mph pace. 20+ mph wind gusts with nowhere to hide. The finish is close but these final 20 miles will empty you.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Ozark Mountain gravel with punchy repeated climbs

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.narration: Full suffering breakdown on the site. Link in bio.
beats.visual: Full map with all zones lit up
beats.editing_note: Loop design: end with zoomed-out map that connects back to the opening frame.
